card.card: {"item":{"at_control":"","category":"daily","description":"#少女歌剧# 【2\/2】卸下舞台上的紧张感，在这本#2再演的星光席特典里，收录了舞台少女们嬉笑打闹的一面。这就像一份餐后水果，希望各位能轻松收下。（资源自扫，禁止转载和二次上传）","id":29517409,"is_fav":0,"pictures":[{"img_height":972,"img_size":184.04296875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/62d010375b29f61fd6386f6d5e617387f9be75f5.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690},{"img_height":969,"img_size":167.68359375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/589199d65d423973932c7511a3f8e8e471fa1aee.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690},{"img_height":967,"img_size":167.2568359375,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/29d4de070e5d5f4713673acd31533b0303f76cf4.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690},{"img_height":964,"img_size":151.7119140625,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/c15a8678bea8bc5478635c842b7d8720430bf9da.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690},{"img_height":960,"img_size":169.248046875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/9ade64866c07761c6e7415c3c39dc7726201371b.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690},{"img_height":964,"img_size":68.58203125,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/774167c284e77a17bbee37041e8a5fbac39d670a.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690},{"img_height":967,"img_size":64.654296875,"img_src":"https:\/\/i0.hdslb.com\/bfs\/album\/c8d415e42dac5961108b942b232680313f0a401d.jpg","img_tags":null,"img_width":690}],"pictures_count":7,"reply":17,"role":[],"settings":{"copy_forbidden":"0"},"source":[],"title":"","upload_time":1564244296},"user":{"head_url":"https:\/\/i1.hdslb.com\/bfs\/face\/7626da8b83eb3872860f9f9c7496a8f800c480b1.jpg","name":"圣翔音乐学院放送科","uid":234441166,"vip":{"avatar_subscript":0,"due_date":1579017600000,"label":{"label_theme":"","path":"","text":""},"nickname_color":"","status":0,"theme_type":0,"type":1,"vip_pay_type":0}}}
